messages.text:
Perhaps there is a better way then to duplicate runtime.lockedOSThread with different a name of runtime.golockedOSThread. I am happy to listen. Thank you.

Alex

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: hectorchu@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
